dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3398475W] Pyrexcelwebdesign.com - unauthorized use of my copyrighted
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

________________________________

From: Storecart Web Services [mailto:myukmailbox@yahoo.co.uk] 
Sent: Saturday, March 24, 2007 7:50 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3398475W] Pyrexcelwebdesign.com -
unauthorized use of my copyrighted work

 

It seens to me as if your in breach of your own terms and conditions.

Look at this site and see the message about stealing our work.

http://www.pyrexcelwebdesign.com/about-our-hosting-servers.htm

You company is just as guilty as the person. All emails have been logged
and screenshots have been taken.

Regards
Andrew
SWS UK

(multipart/alternative) 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Abuse Team 

It has come to my attention that your company is hosting a site who has
unauthorized use of my copyrighted work and images from my website
www.rentacart.co.uk 

The site in question is owned by: www.pyrexcelwebdesign.com 

Administrative Contact: 
bada, Babatunde Whois Privacy and Spam Prevention by DomainTools.com 
BBada uk 
32 Thrayle House 
Benedict Road 
London, Armed Forces Other Areas SW9 0XU 
United Kingdom 
07751201080 

I have tried to contact this site owner for the past 4 months now but
does not respond to emails, Live chat, phone or letters. 

I have reserved all rights in the Work, first published in December
2005, and have registered copyright therein. Some pages of this site is
essentially identical to the work and clearly used the Work as its
basis. 

http://www.pyrexcelwebdesign.com/ecommerce-shopping-carts-and-affordable
-ecommerce-hosting.htm 

Has been taken from: 

www.rentacart.co.uk and www.rentacart.co.uk/about_rentacart.htm 

Even the images he is using our our clients 

www.dvdloon.com 
www.numberplategifts.co.uk 

This page here 

http://www.pyrexcelwebdesign.com/affordable-ecommerce-hosting.htm 

Is a copy of 

http://www.rentacart.co.uk/Options.html 

Even the terms and conditions have been copied, if you took through you
will even see OUR BUSINESS ADDRESS. 

''Web Services in writing to: Pyrexcel Web design Web design web
services - 2 Clarendon Court - Clarendon Street - 

NEWPORT - IOW - PO301QZ.'' 

tAKEN FROM 

http://www.pyrexcelwebdesign.com/ecommerce-terms-and-policy.html 

SECTION - DATA PROTECTION 

As the site owner they neither asked for nor received permission to use
the Work. I believe they have willfully infringed my rights under 17
U.S.C. Section 101 et seq. and could be liable for statutory damages as
high as $150,000 as set forth in Section 504(c)(2) therein. I request
that you immediately remove all infringing works derived from the Work
of myself from your servers. 

If I have not received an affirmative response from you within 14 days
indicating that you have fully complied with these requirements, I shall
take further action against you. 

I Appreciate your understanding in this matter 


Regards, 

Mr S B Clarke 
Storecart Web Services 
www.rentacart.co.uk 

T 0870 286 9350 
F 0870 286 9348 


This communication is confidential to Storecart Web Services and is
intended for use only by the addressee. Storecart Web Services accepts
no responsibility for information, errors or omissions in this
communication or use or misuse thereof or any act done or omitted to be
done in connection with the same. 


STORECART WEB SERVICES - PO BOX 166 - NEWPORT - PO30 9BB 
Rentacart.co.uk is a trading name of Storecart Web Services. A Member of
the UKWDA and FSB.
